## Mission

Write a run-local ADR that binds a chosen design option to evidence.

## Context

{{#each inputs}}

## Objective

Choose one option from design_options.md (or a named hybrid) and document:
- Decision drivers with REQ/NFR citations
- Alternatives considered with rejection reasons
- Consequences (positive/negative)
- Risks and mitigations
- Assumptions made to proceed

## Constraints

- Write exactly one file: adr.md
- Use OPT-### identifiers from design_options.md
- Do NOT edit docs/adr/ or repo-wide ADR systems
- Bind decision drivers to REQ/NFR IDs when available
